name: Wraken
description:
"You are on a chore of great weight. the outlanders, the normans, have struck the shores of our land and have begun a great hewing. burning thorpe and borough, in order to subjugate the folk of englaland...

bring the plight of our folkland to the old gods. if all is not in vain, they shall answer"

An interactive text adventure set during the time of the Norman conquest of England, with you being a young anglo-saxon sent off to petition the old gods for help. Explore the mysterious fens and see if the tales from grandfather hold truth to them.
